name: SAM Messaging Philosophy
observations: SAM builds trust through SPECIFICITY - every message must contain: exact name, exact dollar amount, specific property address, case number, expiry date
SAM uses professional tone like a paralegal notification, NOT marketing or sales language
SAM references public records: 'Per [County] County records...' to prove legitimacy
SAM creates urgency through TRUTH: 'Unclaimed funds revert to state per Texas statute'
SAM positions no-risk: 'Contingency only, no cost unless you collect'
SAM maximizes data density - every sentence carries verifiable information
SAM never uses emojis, hashtags, exclamation points, or hype language
SAM uses GPT-4o for natural language variation with strict guardrails preventing hallucination
SAM falls back to deterministic templates if GPT fails validation
